summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the plasma physics library's thermal speed calculations, including standard, coefficient-based, lightweight, and kappa-distribution methods. The tests check numerical accuracy, proper handling of invalid inputs and edge cases, emission of appropriate warnings, and integration with just-in-time compilation mechanisms.
business_intent: To guarantee the scientific correctness and robustness of thermal speed computation tools used in plasma research, thereby supporting reliable simulations, data analysis, and software quality assurance for users of the library.
